text: The Capri 22 is an American sailboat, that was designed by Gary Mull and Frank Butler and first built in 1984. ==Production== The boat was first built by Catalina Yachts of Hollywood, California in 1984 and remains in production. ==Design== Capri 22 Capri 22 Capri 22 cockpit The Capri 22 is a small recreational keelboat, built predominantly of fiberglass, with wood trim. It has a fractional sloop rig, a transom hung rudder and a conventional fin keel, shoal-draft keel or winged keel.
